bike.description: OCLV Mountain Carbon main frame & swingarm, Carbon Armor, ABP Convert, Flow Mold Carbon swing link, G2 Geometry, E2 tapered head tube, replaceable derailleur hanger, 110mm travel

components.description: Bontrager Race Lite TLR Disc 29 wheel system, 15mm FCC front hub, 142x12mm rear hub, 28 hole, Tubeless Ready
Bontrager Race X Lite Carbon Big Sweep, 12 degree sweep
FSA NO.57, E2, ACB sealed bearings
Shimano Deore XT hydraulic disc brakes
Trek fork & shock sag meter, Bontrager shock pump
